english_translation: It is better to just give, rather than to compromise and relinquish;
The strength to give tomorrow may or may not exist!

kannada_original: ಕರೆವ ಹಸು ಒಂದೆ ತೆರ ಹಾಲ ಕೊಡದಿರಬಹುದು ;
english_transliteration: kareva hasu oṃde tera hāla koḍadirabahudu;
english_translation: A milking cow might not give milk in the same way,

kannada_original: ಕರ ದಣಿವ ತನಕ ಕೊಡು – ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ. 551
english_transliteration: kara daṇiva tanaka koḍu – Muddu Rāma. 551
english_translation: Give until your hand is tired – Muddu Rāma. 551
